#A no-frills guide to get GEM up and running.

= Introduction =

GEM has been designed to be operated through the emi user interface (see http://code.google.com/p/getemi). While emi enables users unfamiliar with GAMS to operate GEM, some users may prefer to work directly with the GEM codes and input data files.
